item.title: VeeamOn 2019 Presentation â€“ Automate Yourself Out of a Backup Job: Advanced PowerShell and API Usage
item.description: I have had requests to make my slides from the newest “Automate Yourself Out of a Backup Job” presentation available, so I am finally getting them posted here for public download. The attachment is only a PDF export of the presentation slides themselves. I will be working on recording my demo videos with some added voiceover, so they will be available outside of the recorded breakout sessions posted on the VeeamON site.
